resources.string: * Create a strong password\nMinimum 1 Uppercase,1 Lowercase,1 Symbol,1 Digit
This section contains codes for all the basic programs needed for dynamic programming.
Videos for the basic algorithms of dynamic programming.
Project Source Code available at following link :
-- Questions in the app are limited as this is a demo app. In further updates, we will work on it\'s question quantity and quality.
-- All Errors and Bugs can be informed to the developer at ydv1608@gmail.com or on the above GitHub Link. Reviews are necessary for the development of app.

-- You could also mail us at ydv1608@gmail.com to suggest different topics which we should add in our app in later releases. Our Technical Team(with 10+ years of experience) will work hard to prepare you on that topic by providing all the latest questions and study material on the topic.
Your single service point for all kinds of exams. Explore your options from the menu!!!
This app contains study materials, notes, youtube tutorials and mock tests for various courses.

This app has a full coverage of various exams that can be checked by going on the Menu->Courses Area. Since it is an evolving app, we have initially added 3 courses only.But we would be extending the topic coverage.\nThis app dynamically changes information to keep you up-to-date with the latest data(of course you have to enable internet for that to happen)

-- Tricky Tests :
We have 2 different type of tests in here -
1.Full-Length test(to get you an in-sight of your overall knowledge)
2.Topic-Oriented(Every topic has separate tests so you can achieve success bit by bit)

--Personal Score Evaluation : 
This is the best part of the app, we must tell you !
We have your score and your crest and troughs to evaluate your efforts.
How does it ensure my privacy?
Your personal details were stored in your storage with encryption and neither the developer nor any other apps shall have access to it.This data is dynamically shown only to you and no one else.
I do not want to share my real name
Your real name will not be visible to the community. However, this name will be used in future to show your national rankings.That\'s why we have a change Name option available for this.
Are my numbers being stored or sold to someone?
The data is stored in your mobile and the developer DOES NOT COLLECT any kind of information related to you.
How to change my user Email ID ?
You could contact our support team at ydv1608@gmail.com and they will verify your phone number and renew your Email ID
How to recover my progress if I lost my Phone/Email ID ?
We have 2 critical points to recover your data:\nEmail Id & Phone Number\nThrough any one of these , we can recover your account.
